author: mcconnell
msg: Correct some test in the build readme.

author: mcconnell
msg: A a smarter ant build that pulls in resources from a repository.  The build also includes some bootstrapping setup features to enable autmatic downloading of the reosurces needed to run the james build, links to the version indexes for the avalon deliverables, and does everything necessary to build the james jar and publish this into a local cache.
